---
title: "Changes to Sexual Identity Response Options in the Youth Risk Behavior Survey - July 2024"
subtitle: "Academic contributions"
---

For the 2021 YRBS, the CDC expanded how they capture sexual identity data. Our team explores this change and provides recommendations for consistent reporting in [JAMA Pediatrics](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1sbM5OZYBKsJ6I3eBtE1JbICRg5HLlrXq/view?usp=sharing).
